alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Rio Grande and south central Saguache Counties through 200 PM MDT... At 127 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of La Garita, or 37 miles northwest of Alamosa, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Garita. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft
